General.Name: Vestjysk Bank A/S
General.Description: Vestjysk Bank A/S provides banking products and services for private and business customers in Jutland, Denmark. The company accepts deposits. It also offers lending and financing for real estate, agriculture, fisheries, renewable Energy, private banking, and large customers. The company was incorporated in 1925 and is based in Herning, Denmark. Vestjysk Bank A/S operates as a subsidiary of A/S Arbejdernes Landsbank.
